kpi.name: M1009C307

kpi_info.title: LTE CS FALLBACK HIGH PRIO IN PREP REQ
kpi_info.use: The number of incoming LTE CS fallback ISHO preparation requests for high priority calls, that is emergency calls initiated in the LTE network. Also M1009C276 and M1009C297 are updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC receives RANAP: RELOCATION REQUEST from the CN and the request is identified to come from LTE (IE "UE History Information" indicates E-UTRAN as the last visited cell) and the IE Radio Network Layer Cause Extension has been set to "CS Fallback triggered" and Source RNC to Target RNC Transparent Container IE contains CSFB Information IE set to "CSFB High Priority".

kpi.kpi_alias: LTE CS FALLBACK HIGH PRIO IN PREP REQ
